mapper.select: select msg.msgno, msg.sender, msg.receiver, msg.cont, msg.type, msg.cdt, m.mno mmno, m.nick, m.profile from message msg join member m on m.mno = msg.receiver where msg.sender=#{sender} or msg.receiver=#{sender} group by m.nick
select msgno, sender, receiver, cont, type, cdt from message where (sender=#{sender} and receiver=#{no}) OR (sender=#{no} and receiver=#{sender}) order by cdt asc;
mapper.insert: insert into message (sender, receiver, cont) value(#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content});
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where sender = #{receiver} and receiver = #{sender};
